app.name: Wolfie.app
common.error_message: An error occurred while trying to load the application. Please try again later.
section.hello.title: Personal dog management app
section.hello.description: Keep track of your dog's health, weight, training and heat with Wolfie.app!
section.hello.web_app: Also available as a web app!
section.about.title: About Wolfie.app
section.about.description:
I become lucky dog owner of Standard Schnauzer in 2022. Shortly, started to look for application to deal with my standard dog things like taking care of her health, weight, feeding and heat.
It took out that there's no such an application. So, I thought that I can create one. I am a software developer, so why not?
I believe in open-source and I want to share my work with the world. I hope that this application will be useful for other dog owners.

Also, it was wonderful opportunity to learn more about SwiftUI and great playground for testing some new technologies.

I am open to any suggestions and ideas. If you have any, feel free to contact me.
section.features.title: Features
section.features.feature_weight.title: Weight
section.features.feature_weight.descript: Keep track of your dog's weight. You can add new weight measurements and see the history of your dog's weight.
section.features.feature_health_log.desc: Keep track of your dog's health. You can add new health logs and see the history of your dog's health.
section.features.feature_heat.title: Heat tracker
section.features.feature_heat.descriptio: Keep track of your dog's heat. You can predict the next heat and see the history of your dog's heat.
section.features.feature_share.title: Share pet's
section.features.feature_share.descripti: You can share your pet's data with others.
section.pricing.title: Pricing
section.pricing.description:
Wolfie.app is free to use. You can use it as long as you want.
There's is only limit to 3 pets per account.
section.pricing.donation: If you like Wolfie.app, you can support me by donating.
section.contact.title: Contact
section.contact.description: If you have any questions, suggestions or ideas, feel free to contact me.
component.footer.cookie_info: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

page.profile_delete.title: Delete account
page.profile_delete.introduction.label: Introduction
page.profile_delete.introduction.item_1: We value your privacy and want to make perfect match options for user that don't want to stay with Wolfie any longer.
page.profile_delete.introduction.item_2: We prepared two options to our Hooman friends that doesn't want to delete their account.
common.form.profile_delete.label: Delete data immediately
common.form.profile_delete.warning: If you chose that you want to remove your account all connected data will be removed for forever.
common.form.profile_delete.checkbox: I understand that there's no way back and all my data will be deleted!
common.form.profile_deactivate.label: Deactivate account
common.form.profile_deactivate.warning: If you choose to deactivate account you can change your mind in next 30 days. We will notify you by e-mail and push notifications on 2 days before that your deletion date in near.
common.form.profile_deactivate.checkbox: I understand that all of my data will be stored for next 30 days and I can decide later.
page.profile_delete.back_up.label: Back-up information
page.profile_delete.back_up.item_1: Your data might be stored in encrypted backup. We keep our backups safely and do our best to prevent need of use them. Back-ups are not stored longer than 7 days after their creation date.

cookie_consent.title: Cookie Consent
cookie_consent.description: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. By browsing this website, you agree to our use of cookies. You can change your cookie settings at any time. You can find more information in our Privacy Policy.
cookie_consent.analytics: This website uses cookies to collect information about how you interact with our website so we can improve it. We use this information to make the website work as well as possible and improve our services.
cookie_consent.crashlytics: This website uses cookies to collect information about how you interact with our website so we can improve it. We use this information to make the website work as well as possible and improve our services.
